s: Mary Ann or Ginger? Coke or Pepsi? Addams Family or Munsters? Good thing we don't have to choose. A little disappointed with them splitting two seasons into three sets, but there are 34 and 30 per season. Of course they are only half hour shows, but very enjoyable to have.

s: I ordered this from a UK seller. It is a Region 2 PAL DVD so you need a region-free player if you order this version. However, the cost is significantly less than the equivalent North American version. Why? Who knows? It is excellent, the original Addams Family.
